page.description: Alpha Anywhere provides the following Categories of actions through the Action Script Genie.

case.title: ReportMailer
case.description: Breaks a report in component reports and sends each component as a PDF file attachment.

case.title: Exit Alpha Anywhere
case.description: Closes the Alpha Anywhere application.

case.title: Open another Database
case.description: Closes the current database and opens another.

case.title: Maximize main Alpha Anywhere window
case.description: Maximizes the top-level Alpha Anywhere window so that it fills the entire screen.

case.title: Minimize main Alpha Anywhere window
case.description: Minimizes the top-level Alpha Anywhere window so that it and it's contents do not appear on the screen.

case.title: Restore main Alpha Anywhere window
case.description: Restores the Alpha Anywhere window to its previous size.

case.title: Branch Command
case.description: Can be used to change the execution of your script based on an expression or the value of a control.

case.title: Goto Label
case.description: Causes your script to start executing at a label created with the Insert Label Action.

case.title: Insert Label
case.description: Inserts a label in the list of actions. You can later use the Goto Label Action to jump to it.

case.title: Control Panel Hide
case.description: Hides the Control Panel.

case.title: Control Panel Maximize
case.description: Maximizes the Control Panel.

case.title: Control Panel Minimize
case.description: Minimizes the Control Panel.

case.title: Control Panel Restore
case.description: Restores the Control Panel window to its previous state.

case.title: Control Panel Set Focus
case.description: Activates the Control Panel.

case.title: Control Panel Show
case.description: Displays the Control Panel after it has been hidden.

case.title: Backup Database Dialog Box
case.description: Displays the Backup Database dialog box, which lets you run and/or save a backup operation.

case.title: Pack Tables
case.description: Allows you to pack tables in your database. This will delete records marked for removal and compress memo files.

case.title: Refresh Passive-Link Tables
case.description: Refreshes Passive-Link Tables

case.title: Restore Database Dialog Box
case.description: Displays the Restore Database dialog box, which asks the user to specify a folder and to select a backup zip file from those that the folder contains.

case.title: Run a Custom Backup Job
case.description: Creates a zip file to backup your database.

case.title: Run One-Step Backup
case.description: Runs a previously saved One-Step backup operation, created with the Backup Database dialog.

case.title: Update Indexes
case.description: Updates the indexes for specified tables.

case.title: Zap Empty Table
case.description: Empties all records from a table.

case.title: Display a Message Box
case.description: Automates the process of creating message boxes.

case.title: Display an XDialog Box
case.description: Greatly simplifies the construction process of Xdialog boxes.

case.title: Open a Form as a Dialog Box
case.description: Provides a alternative approach to displaying a dialog.

case.title: Prompt for Text
case.description: Prompts the user for text and stores it in a variable.

case.title: Prompt for a Number
case.description: Prompts the user for a password and stores it in a variable.

case.title: Prompt for a Password
case.description: Prompts the user for a password and stores it in a variable.

case.title: Prompt for a Date
case.description: Prompts the user for a date and stores it in a variable.

case.title: Prompt for a Folder Name
case.description: Prompts the user for a path and stores it in a variable.

case.title: Prompt for a Filename
case.description: Prompts the user for a filename and stores it in a variable.

case.title: Prompt for an Expression
case.description: Prompts the user for an expression and stores it in a variable.

case.title: Prompt for an Order Expression
case.description: Prompts the user for an order expression and stores it in a variable.

case.title: Prompt for a Filter Expression
case.description: Prompts the user for an filter expression and stores it in a variable.

case.title: Prompt for a Field Name
case.description: Prompts the user for an field name and stores it in a variable.

case.title: Prompt Using Radio Button Dialog
case.description: Prompts the user with a list of radio button choices and records the selected button in a text variable.

case.title: Prompt Using Check Box List Box
case.description: Prompts the user with a list of options and stores the result in a text variable.

case.title: Prompt Using List Box Dialog
case.description: Prompts the user with a list of options and stores the result in a text variable.

case.title: Quick Dialog
case.description: Displays a selection dialog box in any of three styles, using radio buttons, a tree control, or a list box.

case.title: Wait Dialog - Close
case.description: Hides a wait dialog.

case.title: Wait Dialog - Open
case.description: Displays a wait dialog.

case.title: Wait Dialog - Set Percentage
case.description: Sets the messages and percentage parameters of the wait dialog.

case.title: Receive an Email Message
case.description: Allows the user to receive email using the built-in Alpha Anywhere email client.

case.title: Set Email Options
case.description: Allows the user to send email using either the built-in Alpha Anywhere email client, or the user's default email client (e.g. Eudora, Outlook etc.).

case.title: Send an Email Message
case.description: Displays the Email Settings dialog box, which allows the user to set email settings for the built-in Alpha Anywhere email client.

case.title: Send a Table or Set
case.description: Lets you select tables or sets to zip up and send by email.

case.title: Send Selected files
case.description: Lets you select files to send by email as attachments.

case.title: Add Text to Memo Field
case.description: Adds text at any location in a memo field.

case.title: Add Text to RTF Memo Field
case.description: Adds text at any location in an RTF memo field.

case.title: Clear Fields
case.description: Clears the contents of specified fields on a form or browse.

case.title: Dial Phone Number in Field
case.description: Dials a phone number from a field in an open form or browse window using Alpha Anywhere's phone dialer.

case.title: Get Field Values (into Variables)
case.description: Retrieves the "Value" properties of object(s) on a form or browse into variables.

case.title: Inspect Memo or Image Field
case.description: Displays the contents of a memo or image field.

case.title: Select Text in a Field
case.description: Highlights text in a form or browse window.

case.title: Set Field Values
case.description: Enters values into one or more fields on a form or browse layout.

case.title: Set Image File Name in Linked Image Field
case.description: Specifies the image filename for a linked image field.

case.title: Set Insertion Point in a Field
case.description: Places the cursor to a specified location in a field.

case.title: Spell-check Fields
case.description: Spell checks specified fields and records.

case.title: Find by Key
case.description: Searches for records matching a specified key value.

case.title: Find by Key Dialog (Standard)
case.description: Displays the Find by Key dialog.

case.title: Find by Key Dialog (Custom)
case.description: Displays the Find by Key dialog. It allows you to customize the settings of the dialog or leave them up to the user.

case.title: Locate Text
case.description: Finds text in a form or browse.

case.title: Locate Text Dialog
case.description: Displays the Locate dialog that allows the reader to search for text.

case.title: Find by Form
case.description: Displays the Find By Form dialog box.

case.title: Activate a Form/Browse Window
case.description: Gives focus to an open window.

case.title: Allow Edits
case.description: Allows the user to enter and edit records in the current or another specified form.

case.title: Close Form/Browse
case.description: Closes the current window, or another form or browse window.

case.title: Disallow Edits
case.description: Prevents the user from making any changes to records in the specified form or browse window.

case.title: Mail Merge with Microsoft Word
case.description: Exports records to the Microsoft Word Mail Merge function.

case.title: Navigator
case.description: Displays a small, modeless, pop-up window which allows users to quickly give focus to a particular field on a form.

case.title: Open Default Form or Browse
case.description: Opens the default form or browse window for a table or set.

case.title: Open Form or Browse Layout
case.description: Opens a form or browse.

case.title: Quick Export to Excel
case.description: Exports the current selection of records to Excel and then opens Excel with the records loaded into a new worksheet.

case.title: Refresh Display
case.description: Refreshes all the data displayed in the current or another specified window.

case.title: Set Modal Data Entry Style?
case.description: Changes data entry style of a specified form or browse to Modal.

case.title: Set Modeless Data Entry Style
case.description: Changes data entry style of a specified form or browse to Modeless.

case.title: Swap Form in Window
case.description: Opens a different form for the current record in a new window.

case.title: Toggle Form or Browse Mode
case.description: Switches between the form and browse views of a table or set.

case.title: Zoom to Record
case.description: Opens the form view of the current record in an embedded browse.

case.title: Multi-Field Quick Sort
case.description: Runs a custom sort defined by the user at run-time.

case.title: Quick Sort
case.description: Sorts the records in a window, based on the control that currently has focus, or on another explicitly specified control.

case.title: Run Saved Query
case.description: Sorts records in a window based on search and sort criteria in a previously saved query operation.

case.title: Select Index Dialog
case.description: Displays the Primary Index or Query dialog, from which the user may select the primary index or query list for the current form or browse.

case.title: Set Index
case.description: Sets the primary index or query list for a form or browse.

case.title: Set Record Number Order
case.description: Sets the primary index for a form or browse to record number order.

case.title: Select Action from the Form Menu
case.description: Allows an object to run one of the actions listed in the form's menu.

case.title: Select action from the Control Panel
case.description: Allows an object to run one of the actions listed in the Control Panel 's menu.

case.title: Display Help Topic
case.description: Opens a help file (Windows .HLP or .CHM formats or an Alpha 5 help file) to display a topic to the user.

case.title: Open a non-Alpha Anywhere File
case.description: Opens a file with its Windows associated application.

case.title: Open a URL
case.description: Launches the user's browser and opens the specified URL.

case.title: Play Sound
case.description: Plays a specified .WAV sound file.

case.title: Run Another Program
case.description: Executes another program outside of Alpha Anywhere.

case.title: Send Keys
case.description: Specifies keystrokes to send to Alpha Anywhere or another application.

case.title: Switch to Another non-Alpha Anywhere Window
case.description: Sets focus to another non-Alpha Anywhere window.

case.title: Refresh Shadow Database
case.description: Refreshes the current database if it is a shadow database.

case.title: Activate an Object
case.description: Gives focus to an object in an open window.

case.title: Disable Objects
case.description: Renders objects unable to receive focus.

case.title: Enable Objects
case.description: Allows previously disabled objects to receive focus.

case.title: Get Properties of Objects
case.description: Retrieves specified properties of one or more object(s) on a form or browse.

case.title: Get 'Text' Property of Objects
case.description: Retrieves the 'Text' property of one or more object(s) on a form or browse.

case.title: Get 'Value' Property of Objects
case.description: Retrieves the 'Value' property of one or more object(s) on a form or browse.

case.title: Hide Objects
case.description: Hides objects on a window.

case.title: Refresh Objects
case.description: Refreshes the displayed contents of one or more objects.

case.title: Set Border Style of Objects
case.description: Sets the border attributes of one or more objects.

case.title: Set Fill Style of Objects
case.description: Sets the fill properties of one or more objects.

case.title: Set Font Property of Objects
case.description: Sets the font attributes of one or more objects.

case.title: Set Properties of Objects
case.description: Sets specified properties of one or more field, text or button objects.

case.title: Set 'Text' Property of Objects
case.description: Sets the text that is displayed by one or more objects.

case.title: Set 'Value' Property of Objects
case.description: Sets the 'Value' property of one or more object(s) on a form or browse.

case.title: Show Objects
case.description: Reveals objects previously hidden in a window.

case.title: Create Operation
case.description: Allows the user to create a new Alpha Anywhere operation.

case.title: Run Saved Operation
case.description: Allows you to run a previously created operation.

case.title: Archive a Layout
case.description: Allows you to print, preview, email, or save a layout in a variety of formats.

case.title: Display Print Current Record Dialog
case.description: Displays the Print Current Record dialog box, which allows the user to print, preview, email, or save the current record using any layout they choose.

case.title: Display Print/Send Selected Records Dialog
case.description: Displays the Print Layout Genie allowing the user to print, preview, email, or save the selected record using any layout they choose.

case.title: Override Default Filename for Print to File
case.description: Sets the default filename for print to file.

case.title: Override Default Printer
case.description: Allows you to set any available printer to be the default printer.

case.title: Preview a Layout
case.description: Allows you to print, preview, email, or save a layout in a variety of formats.

case.title: Print a Layout
case.description: Allows you to print, preview, email, or save a layout in a variety of formats.

case.title: Restore Default Filename for Print to File
case.description: Restores the default filename for print to file.

case.title: Restore Default Printer
case.description: Restores the default printer for your computer.

case.title: Save a Layout to a File
case.description: Allows you to print, preview, email, or save a layout in a variety of formats.

case.title: Send a Layout via Email
case.description: Allows you to print, preview, email, or save a layout in a variety of formats.

case.title: Multi-field Quick Filter
case.description: Displays the Multi-field Quick Filter dialog box, which allows the user to select multiple fields on which to base the filter.

case.title: Query by Expression
case.description: Displays the Query by Expression dialog, which allows the user to enter a filter and order expression to search for records in a table.

case.title: Query by Form
case.description: Switches a form to Query by Form mode.

case.title: Query by Form Clear
case.description: Clears existing Query by Form search criteria from the form.

case.title: Query by Form Exit
case.description: Exits Query by Form mode and returns to the Form View mode.

case.title: Query by Form Run
case.description: Performs the query entered in Query by Form mode.

case.title: Query by Genie
case.description: Displays the Query Genie , allowing the user to enter criteria to search the records in a table.

case.title: Quick Filter
case.description: Filters records in a window based on the value in the control that currently has focus, or on another explicitly specified control.

case.title: Run Custom Query
case.description: Queries records based on custom filter and order expressions.

case.title: Run Saved Query
case.description: Sorts records in a window based on search and sort criteria in a previously saved query operation.

case.title: Show All Records
case.description: Turns off the current query and shows all records in the table.

case.title: Goto First Record
case.description: Displays the first record in current index/query order.

case.title: Goto New Record
case.description: Displays a new, empty record for the user.

case.title: Goto Last Record
case.description: Displays the last record in current index/query order.

case.title: Goto Next Record
case.description: Displays the next record in current index/query order.

case.title: Goto Previous Record
case.description: Displays the previous record in current index/query order.

case.title: Goto Record Key
case.description: Displays the records matching a key value.

case.title: Goto Record Number
case.description: Displays a specified record number based on the current index/query order.

case.title: Cancel Changes
case.description: Removes all edits made to the current record.

case.title: Change Record
case.description: Allows the user to make changes to the current record.

case.title: Copy Previous Field
case.description: Copies the value for the corresponding field in the previous record.

case.title: Copy Previous Record
case.description: Copies information from the last record viewed into a new record.

case.title: Delete Record
case.description: Deletes the current record.

case.title: Duplicate Record
case.description: Creates a duplicate copy of the current record.

case.title: Enter New Record
case.description: Creates and displays a new, empty record for the user.

case.title: Mark Record
case.description: Marks the current record.

case.title: Save Record
case.description: Saves the current record.

case.title: UnMark Record
case.description: Unmarks the current record.

case.title: Xbasic Change Record
case.description: Changes the contents of a record without opening a form or browse.

case.title: Xbasic Enter Record
case.description: Adds a record without opening a form or browse.

case.title: Xbasic View Record
case.description: Displays a window displaying the chosen fields of a specified record.

case.title: Display a Pick-List of Scripts
case.description: Displays a pick-list dialog box, pop-up list, or toolbar of pre-written scripts.

case.title: Display Manage Script Favorites Dialog
case.description: Displays the Manage Script Favorites dialog box that allows you to edit your list of favorite scripts.

case.title: Display Script Favorites Pick-List
case.description: Displays script favorites in the Select Script to Run dialog box, toolbar, or pop-up menu.

case.title: Run a Script
case.description: Runs an Xbasic script.

case.title: Close Connection to SQL Database
case.description: Closes a connection to a back-end SQL database.

case.title: Connect to SQL Database
case.description: Opens a connection to a back-end SQL database.

case.title: Execute DELETE Query on a SQL Database
case.description: Executes a SQL DELETE query against a back-end SQL database.

case.title: Execute INSERT Query on a SQL Database
case.description: Executes a SQL INSERT query against a back-end SQL database.

case.title: Execute SELECT Query on a SQL Database
case.description: Executes a SQL SELECT query against a back-end SQL database.

case.title: Execute UPDATE Query on a SQL Database
case.description: Executes a SQL UPDATE query against a back-end SQL database.

case.title: Dim Variables
case.description: Identifies variables dimensioned outside the current action script.

case.title: Set Variable to Constant or Expression Result
case.description: Stores a constant or expression result in a variable.

case.title: Set Variables to Field Statistics - External Table
case.description: Retrieves statistical information (such as the count, minimum, maximum, average, and variance) about an external table's field or expression.

case.title: Set Variables to Field Statistics - Fields on a Form
case.description: Retrieves statistical information (such as the count, minimum, maximum, average, and variance) about a form's field or expression.

case.title: Set Variables to Field Values - External Table
case.description: Retrieves values of fields in a record in an external table.

case.title: Set Variables to Field Values - Fields on a Form
case.description: Retrieves field values on a form or browse.

case.title: Set Variables to Form/Browse Window Info
case.description: Retrieves various kinds of information about a window.

case.title: Set Variables to Object Properties
case.description: Retrieves the values of properties of object(s) on a form or browse.

case.title: Set Variables to Object Text Property
case.description: Retrieves text properties of one or more object(s) on a form or browse.

case.title: Activate Window
case.description: Sets focus to a window.

case.title: Close Window
case.description: Closes a window.

case.title: Disable Window
case.description: Makes a window unable to receive focus.

case.title: Enable Window
case.description: Allows a window to receive focus.

case.title: Hide Window
case.description: Hides a window.

case.title: Maximize Window
case.description: Maximizes a window.

case.title: Minimize Window
case.description: Minimizes a window.

case.title: Position Window
case.description: Places a window a specific location.

case.title: Restore Window
case.description: Restores a window to its normal state after being minimized or maximized.

case.title: Set Z Order of Window
case.description: Repositions a window to the top or bottom of the stack of visible windows, or underneath a specified window.

case.title: Show Window
case.description: Displays a hidden window.

case.title: Cancel Event
case.description: Cancels a form event if a condition is not met.

case.title: End Script
case.description: Ends the current script.

case.title: Inline Xbasic
case.description: Inserts Xbasic into a script.

case.title: Turn Hourglass On
case.description: Changes the cursor to hourglass mode.

case.title: Turn Hourglass Off
case.description: Changes the cursor back to normal.

case.title: Wait for Idle
case.description: Temporarily pauses Alpha Anywhere while the user interface is being displayed.

case.title: Xbasic Debugger Off
case.description: Disables debugging of Xbasic code.

case.title: Xbasic Debugger On
case.description: Enables debugging of Xbasic code.

case.title: Display Xdialog Form based on ADO/ODBC Data
case.description: Displays data from an external ADO or ODBC compliant database.

case.title: Display an XDialog Box
case.description: Greatly simplifies the construction process of Xdialog boxes.
